# Getting Started Example

This example app demonstrates a page with a form, a dummy-backed model, an ai call, and a simple flow.

Commands:
```
n3 parse examples/getting_started/app.ai
n3 run --file examples/getting_started/app.ai getting-started
n3 run-flow --file examples/getting_started/app.ai --flow pipeline
```

Use `n3 serve --dry-run` then open Studio to view the pages and flows.
